message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.HC, cs.CL 

This paper deals with news personalization algorithms and system architecture for generating immediate personalized news. The algorithms are based on collaborative filtering and click-through rate, which are commonly used in information retrieval (IR) and machine learning (LG) research. The paper also discusses the system architecture, which involves designing a scalable and efficient system for delivering personalized news to users. This falls under the sub-categories of systems and infrastructure (SI) and human-computer interaction (HC). Finally, the paper evaluates the proposed method both offline and online, which involves natural language processing (CL) techniques for analyzing user behavior and news articles.
